name: Aromatisse
author: Saya Tsuruta
flavor_text: It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant, and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order to gain an edge in battle.

attacks.name: Pungent Aroma
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is heads, your opponent reveals their hand. For each heads, choose a card you find there. Your opponent shuffles those cards into their deck.

attacks.name: Miraculous Cologne
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a Special Condition. Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.
